name: Kilrot Cellar-tec
description: Kilrot are a well-founded family organis
overview:
Kilrot are a well-founded family organisation that has been trading since 1978. They offer the Consultancy in timber decay and structural dampness. They work in remedial basement waterproofing and timber treatments. They provide the reinforcement service and structural repair as the Helafix approved contractor.

Kilrot are the members of the Construction Line, the PCA (Property Care Association) and the Accredited Wykamol Users Association, and are certified installers for the Thor Helical Remedial. These are the professional bodies that make sure that the greatest standards are kept within the industry of the remedial treatment. They are also the members of a scheme managed by the DTI, the Quality Mark.
